Reviews.Title: The Canon camera is fine, the accessories especially the telephoto lens was only 2x zoom, my expectations fell to the floor,
Reviews.Author: Edgar C Dizon
Reviews.Content: I regretted I purchased this package deal. I should have asked questions first before making the purchase. Being a novice in photography not knowing much about cameras, I was teased by the package. Now I need to replace those accessories that are inferior and I am not buying from the same merchant.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on the camera
Reviews.Author: ray santullo
Reviews.Content: the accessories were basically low end cheap items but it beats using Styrofoam to fill the box blah blah blah

Reviews.Title: Great Deal of a camera!
Reviews.Author: Fabio A Iguavita Duarte
Reviews.Content: Great Deal! the only thing I didn't like was the Class 4 SD card, it doesn't let you record HD videos longer than 15 segs. That could be fixed if you acquire a (at least) Class 6 SD Card. The Bag it came with the camera, wasn't really a good bad, I had to throw it away. However, I still consider one of the greatest Deals around!

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Jose R Cerda
Reviews.Content: This was the best deal for this camera bundle. I am very happy with my purchase. It came with everything they advertised. The camera and the lens are not heavy at all. Amazing quality. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Craig Fent
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas gift for my wife and she loves it.  The kit has just about anything you need, although it could have included a better flash, but for the price it was a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet expectations
Reviews.Author: David E. Johnson
Reviews.Content: This bundle did not meed expectations.  I was expecting a Canon telephoto lens, rather it came with a Vivatar magnifier.  Other items not needed so package was returned.

Reviews.Title: Thrilled with the buying experience.  Camera is a 3.5 stars
Reviews.Author: Mr. Richard A. Sirois "Rick"
Reviews.Content: SuperFinds was super responsive when I had questions after the purchase.  They even did a price match after the fact with simple email communication.  They made the experience great.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel EOS SL_- 1 camera
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Wells
Reviews.Content: The over-all kit was fabulous. It amounts to a significant savings to other choices. A longer focal length lens would have been a bonus. The camera is everything it was advertised to be and takes great pictures as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Devo
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a chance to use the camera to the fullest. But, I love the size, portability, and ease of handling. Can't wait to take on my trip in about 3 weeks.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Great deal
Reviews.Content: I searched the Internet and located this deal. None of the other deals included what I received with this package, not to mention the price was the lowest on the market. The camera is amazing!!

ProductInfo.Features:
The SuperFinds Kit Includes Some of the most Basic and Necessary Accessories for your Camera and Lens
New Canon EOS Rebel SL1 18.0 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm EF-S IS STM Lens with all the original manufacturer accesories
1}Wide Angle Converter Lens 2} Telephoto Converter Lens 3} Full Size Lightweight Tripod 4}Deluxe Camera Bag
5} 4-Piece +1 +2 +4 +10 Close-Up Macro Filter Set with Case 6} Multi-Coated 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD)
7} All You Need Accesory Kit (Screen Protector , Full Cleaning Kit , Lens Cap Holder)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens Full 16GB Kit + Wide Angle , Telephoto + Full Size Tripod + Deluxe Camera Bag + Four Piece Macro Set + Essential Filter Kit + All You Need Accesory Kit (Screen Protector , Full Cleaning Kit , Lens Cap Holder)
